identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a premium, dark-mode Web3 experience that feels alive, not generic.

headings.usage: Main headers, section titles. ALWAYS use tight tracking.

mono.usage: Crypto addresses, transaction hashes, currency amounts, data values.

gradients.hero: radial-gradient(circle at top center, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.15) 0%, rgba(5, 5, 5, 0) 70%)
gradients.card_glow: radial-gradient(800px circle at var(--mouse-x) var(--mouse-y), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06), transparent 40%)

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12 for containers. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.
spacing.rule: Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

noise_texture.instruction: Add a fixed, pointer-events-none div with a noise background image at 3-5% opacity over the entire app to give it texture.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(16,185,129,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white transition-all rounded-full px-6 py-2
buttons.ghost: text-gray-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-[#0A0A0B] border border-white/5 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden relative group
cards.animated: Use Framer Motion for entrance animations (opacity: 0, y: 20 -> opacity: 1, y: 0)

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 transition-all

status_badges.pending: bg-yellow-500/10 text-yellow-500 border border-yellow-500/20 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider
status_badges.paid: bg-green-500/10 text-green-500 border border-green-500/20 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider
status_badges.failed: bg-red-500/10 text-red-500 border border-red-500/20 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider

client_page.structure: min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center p-4 relative overflow-hidden

animations.number_counter: Use framer-motion 'animate' to count up numbers in stats cards.

images.description: Abstract dark blockchain network for hero backgrounds or overlays.
3D floating crypto coins for success states or hero sections.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT GLOBAL NOISE: Add a fixed overlay with noise texture in App.js/App.css to immediately elevate the premium feel.
2. REFINE TYPOGRAPHY: Ensure all headings use 'Space Grotesk' with 'tracking-tight'. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL numbers (amounts, dates, addresses).
3. ANIMATE EVERYTHING: Use Framer Motion for page transitions, list entrances, and hover states. Static pages are forbidden.
4. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure the dashboard collapses gracefully. Use a bottom sheet or slide-over menu for mobile navigation.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the defined glassmorphism classes for the invoice card and dashboard widgets.
6. TIPPING: Add a tipping UI in the client invoice view using a segmented control or slider.
7. CHAIN SELECTION: Use a visual selector (with icons) for USDT/USDC chains (ERC20, TRC20, BEP20).
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use Space Grotesk.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #0A0A0B.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
